text: Mientras conmemoramos el #MesDeLaHerenciaHispana, rindámosle un homenaje a nuestra cultura, nuestra historia y a los múltiples logros de los Americanos de herencia Hispana en esta gran nación. ¡Que viva nuestra herencia Latina! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DnIvoScXoAAJ42k.jpg

As we commemorate #HispanicHeritageMonth let us pay tribute to our culture, our history, and the many accomplishments of Americans of Hispanic descent in this great nation. ¡Que viva nuestra herencia Latina! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DnIuZU_XoAAwum6.jpg

Hoy, el pueblo de #Nicaragua celebra el día de su independencia bajo un régimen opresivo que continúa violando los derechos humanos del pueblo. Tristemente el país afronta una dictadura tiránica que se ha empeñado en silenciar y oprimir a sus oponentes.

Today, the people of #Nicaragua celebrate their independence day under an oppressive regime that continues to violate their human rights. Sadly, the country faces a tyrannical dictatorship that vows to silence and oppress its opponents.
Feliz Día de la Independencia a los pueblos de #Honduras, #Guatemala, #ElSalvador y #CostaRica. Nos unimos a estos grandes países centroamericanos mientras celebran su patriotismo.
Happy Independence Day to the people of #Honduras, #Guatemala, #ElSalvador, and #CostaRica. We join these great Central American countries as they celebrate their patriotism.

Happy #HispanicHeritageMonth! Let’s all lift up and celebrate the culture, heritage, and contributions Hispanic Americans have made in their communities and around the world.

10 years ago today, Lehman Brothers collapsed & set off the worst financial crisis since the Great Depression. Millions of families still feel its effects, even as bank lobbyists try to roll back the rules on our financial system. We can’t sit back & let another crisis happen. https://twitter.com/globeopinion/status/1040641180151816197 QT @GlobeOpinion 10 years after #LehmanBrothers, Washington should be pushing for stricter oversight and more accountability for giant banks. 

From @SenWarren: https://www.bostonglobe.com/opinion/2018/09/14/years-after-lehman-collapse-washington-back-its-old-tricks/jzQyALKV4NP5WWSCYMWRDK/story.html

Suicide is the second leading cause of death among teenagers in America — and transgender male teens are at a heightened risk. It’s critical as a nation we accept these teens for who they are. 
https://twitter.com/NBCNightlyNews/status/1040278935282434049 QT @NBCNightlyNews Half of transgender male teens have attempted suicide, study finds. https://www.nbcnews.com/feature/nbc-out/half-transgender-male-teens-have-attempted-suicide-study-finds-n909261
